structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Effect of provisions for financing with revenue bonds.
law.text: KRS 76.366 and 76.367 shall not repeal nor reduce any existing rights or duties of a sewer construction district, and the commissioners thereof, but shall constitute an additional and alternate method of financing.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1958.
